attributes.action: introduce legislation to allow common or garden taxpayers of this country to be selected at random and appointed, for periods not exceeding one calendar year, to be members of the fee approval committee reviewing MPs expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious the current incumbents have failed abysmally, probably through threats about their jobs and other political pressure from the dishonourable ladies and gentlemen who have decided that these expenses replace salary and are part of their entitlement.  People who are subject to political or other pressure should NOT be allowed into this position again.  Taxpayers money needs to be looked after by taxpayers and not political puppets.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
